subTitle.cn: 圖靈區塊鏈證書生態系

service.title: Blockchain Achievement Resume
service.description: Through its novel blockchain technology, TuringCerts is incorruptible, traceable, cost-effective, and borderless, which redefines traditional educational certificates to create a sustainable academic records tracking. TuringCerts guarantees the 100% control of data for users with a rigorous privacy policy and strengthens the highest trust of source and true value of official authorized certificates.

0.title: Foundamental Phase
0.content: TuringCerts in the foundamental phase are executed on the second generation blockchain - Ethereum, and are supervised and operated by multiple sophisticated Smart Contracts. IPFS is leveraged to parallelly keep huge-sizing digital images of certificates.

1.title: Advanced Stage
1.content: TuringCerts has reached a strategic collaboration with National Cheng Kung University and BiiLabs on technical infrastructures. TuringCerts is actively cooperating with the world-renowned IOTA Foundation for in-depth global adoptions. At this stage, TuringCerts will be migrated to the IOTA blockchain, with connection to the open source TangelID acceleration layer, in order to serve a extremely low commission fee and latency.

0.title: (1) 如何確保證書唯一真實性？
0.content: TuringCerts 將使用全球網際網路標準 W3C 提出之 DID 分布式身份標準，賦予每位證書持有者獨特唯一之身份證明，另以哈希值阻擋內容竄改或謬誤，除防偽特徵為更有利於證書的長期保管與追蹤。

1.title: (2) 如何確實保護使用者隱私？
1.content: TuringCerts 採用 MIT Media Lab 於早期開源證書體系 BlockCerts 所考量的“最小權限原則”，僅授與認證方最少但充足的認證資源，以RSA非對稱加密反向保護用戶提供資料極高隱私性。

2.title: (3) 如何讓 TuringCerts 在全球保有領先地位？
2.content: TuringCerts 將由創辦人於 UC Berkeley Blockchain Lab 的加速器持續吸收並整合矽谷區塊鏈圈內的技術創新，保持其安全性與應用特性在全球的技術與落地領先地位，並藉由香港與台灣的教育體系進行有效社會實驗案例。

demo.title: The New Era of Resumes!
demo.description: All certificates in one place. From academic achievement, competency certification, online courses, competition & awards, to all worth-noting records. TuringCerts improve the certification experience, ensuring the characteristics of anti-counterfeit, traceability, and minimized learning curve.
